item.title: Savannah Hop-On Hop-Off Trolley Tour
item.description: This Savannah hop-on hop-off trolley tour makes exploring Savannah super easy. The trolley’s route stops at 15 stops around the city and passes by more than 100 points of interest along the way. Plus, there’s narration about the city’s sights and history that you can enjoy as you ride through Savannah. You can get off at any of the 15 stops and hop back on again at one of the stops, too.

image.alt: Savannah Hop-On Hop-Off Trolley Tour

item.title: Savannah First Squares Culinary & Cultural Walking Food Tour
item.description: Discover the sights and sounds of Savannah on this guided, walking food tour. Learn about the city's fascinating history, elegant architecture, and unique culture with food tastings at several specialty food stores and restaurants in the area. Sample the local favorites that may include shrimp and grits, pork belly donut sliders, and one-of-a-kind honey. When all is digested and done, it adds up to an authentic southern lunch.

image.alt: Savannah First Squares Culinary & Cultural Walking Food Tour

item.title: Savannah History and Haunts Candlelit Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: Get an alternative view of Savannah and delve deeper than most into its fraught history of war, executions, murders, and mystery on this historical ghost tour. Guided by the glow of a lantern, follow your guide through historic squares and cobblestone streets, past moss-draped oaks, as they recount eerie tales.

image.alt: Savannah History and Haunts Candlelit Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Trolley Tour of Savannah
item.description: Hop on and hop off this trolley tour at more than 15 stops to explore Savannah's most important attractions. Get a comprehensive tour while listening to engaging narration about Savannah's history, culture, and people.

image.alt: Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Trolley Tour of Savannah

item.title: Historic Savannah Guided Walking Tour
item.description: Take a leisurely stroll through the squares and streets of the Savannah Historic District on this walking tour. Together with a resident of Savannah, visit one of the largest National Historic Landmark Districts in the US. See the historic homes as well as the houses of the South’s most famous generals. Visit the buildings from the war years of the 1860s and learn about the town’s storied past.

image.alt: Historic Savannah Guided Walking Tour

item.title: Narrated Historic Savannah Sightseeing Trolley Tour
item.description: Step into Savannah’s fascinating history on a trolley tour of the city’s cobblestone streets and elegant neighborhoods. Hear stories from the old South as you ride with an engaging guide, who points out the landmarks and mansions you pass along the way. Trolleys depart regularly throughout the day from a central location in historic Savannah.

image.alt: Narrated Historic Savannah Sightseeing Trolley Tour

item.title: Southern Flavors Food, Pub Crawl, and History Walking Tour
item.description: Without a culinary tour of Savannah, you might miss out on some of the authentic Southern cuisine packing the city full of flavor. Try Lowcountry classics like shrimp and grits, plus Southern standbys including pimento cheese bites. As you walk through the historic district, your guide shares fun stories from Savannah’s past.

image.alt: Southern Flavors Food, Pub Crawl, and History Walking Tour

item.title: Genteel and Bard's Savannah Dark History and Ghost Encounter Walking Tour
item.description: Immerse in Savannah’s deepest, darkest sagas and most haunted locations on this eerie interactive history walk. Take the museum experience outside on this interactive, guided tour where you hear historic stories while you enjoy looking at photos, music, and professionally-recorded first-account letters. High-range audio headsets enable you to easily listen to your guide so you don't miss a word.

image.alt: Genteel and Bard's Savannah Dark History and Ghost Encounter Walking Tour

item.title: Distinctly Savannah Food Tour
item.description: On this lunchtime walking tour, stroll through Savannah's Historic Landmark District and sample unique tastings at up to six different restaurants. With a food-loving guide and a small group of 14 people or fewer, explore both little-known haunts and well-known hot spots. During this outing, you’ll taste the dishes that make Savannah’s food scene so unique. Listen as your local guide fills you in on Savannah's distinctive culture, tumultuous history, and endearing quirks. Between the food and conversation, you’ll leave both gastronomically and intellectually satisfied.

image.alt: Distinctly Savannah Food Tour

item.title: Bonaventure Cemetery Walking Tour with Transportation
item.description: Explore the Bonaventure Cemetery with a guide during this small-group walking tour. Get picked up at your hotel in downtown Savannah for easy transportation to the cemetery. On arrival, walk through Bonaventure Cemetery with an academically trained historian who is full of stories about local history, heritage, and culture. Go for a stroll beneath the oaks and learn about Savannah’s past.

image.alt: Bonaventure Cemetery Walking Tour with Transportation

item.title: Savannah to Tybee Island with Dolphin Cruise
item.description: If you don’t have your own car, visiting Tybee Island from Savannah can be tough. This guided tour makes it easy to take the quick drive in comfortable private transportation—not to mention it means you don’t have to deal with parking at Savannah’s most popular nearby beach. Enjoy free time and a dolphin watching cruise when you arrive for a crowd-pleasing favorite experience.

image.alt: Savannah to Tybee Island with Dolphin Cruise

item.title: 2-Hour Bonaventure Cemetery Walking Tour
item.description: Experience the haunting beauty and history of stunning Savannah on this Bonaventure Cemetery tour. Follow your expert guide just beyond the limits of the historic district and wander through the tombstones and gardens of this 170-year-old location. Learn about the lives of its famous inhabitants and why the cemetery is considered by locals to be the place where death and beauty meet.

image.alt: 2-Hour Bonaventure Cemetery Walking Tour

item.title: 60-Minute Guided Segway History Tour of Savannah
item.description: Experience Savannah like never before on this guided, 1-hour, small-group Segway tour. As the largest National Historic Landmark District in the US, Savannah offers more than 20 city squares filled with historic homes, museums, churches, mansions, monuments and the famous forts of the Revolutionary and Civil War eras. Learn about the history, as well as some fun, modern facts, of this great city. Guided Segway training is included. Dress in weather-appropriate clothes with flat, closed-toed shoes.

image.alt: 60-Minute Guided Segway History Tour of Savannah

item.title: Sixth Sense Savannah Ghost Tour
item.description: Experience the thrill of Savannah's haunted history while you walk around downtown on this Sixth Sense Savannah Ghost Tour. Follow your expert guide around the haunted sites and spooky landmarks of Savannah while learning about the real, chilling accounts that breathe life into the city's storied past. Choose from a family-friendly or adults-only tour to better suit your group.

image.alt: Sixth Sense Savannah Ghost Tour

item.title: Haunted Savannah Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: Discover some of the most haunted places in Savannah during a small-group ghost and pub walking tour. Meet your guide and set out on a city stroll that includes four popular pubs and bars. Learn about the history and haunted past of these watering holes as you raise a glass in each pub. Combine history with a night out during this walking tour.

image.alt: Haunted Savannah Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Spooky Savannah Haunted Pub Crawl
item.description: This Spooky Savannah haunted pub crawl combines two of the city’s best assets: a haunted history and a great party scene. As you walk through Savannah’s historic district, your guide shares spooky stories and points out sites of local lore, including four haunted pubs. Stop in for a drink and then take it to go as you walk to the next location.

image.alt: Spooky Savannah Haunted Pub Crawl

item.title: "Savannah for Morons" Comedy Trolley Tour
item.description: History and humor collide on this comedy trolley tour. Titled: “Savannah for Morons”, this guided experience lets you sit back and soak in the sights of downtown Savannah. Laugh as you learn about landmarks such as Forsyth Park and Colonial Park Cemetery. Pass by the Green-Meldrim House and Mercer Williams House Museum while watching costumed guides perform skits, musical numbers, and more.

image.alt: "Savannah for Morons" Comedy Trolley Tour

item.title: 2-Hour Explore Savannah Bike Tour
item.description: Discover the city of Savannah by bike with a small-group guided tour. Cover ground quickly and get to know several different areas of the city. See top Savannah attractions including Forsyth Park, City Market, and historic River Street. Learn about local history and heritage as you visit landmarks such as the Andrew Low House and Cathedral of St. John the Baptist. Maximize time in Savannah with this green bike tour.

image.alt: 2-Hour Explore Savannah Bike Tour

item.title: Heart of Savannah History Walking Tour - 2hr
item.description: Discover the most famous landmarks and lesser-known historic points of interest in Savannah on this walking tour. Get a comprehensive overview of the city as you follow your guide down the city’s oak-lined streets and walk through the heart of the historic district, ending in Forsyth Park. Hear about stories and events from the American Revolution and Civil War, plus see where Forrest sat with his box of chocolates.

image.alt: Heart of Savannah History Walking Tour - 2hr

item.title: Bonaventure Cemetery Is Forever Tour
item.description: Explore Savannah’s famous Bonaventure Cemetery on this guided tour. Choose from a morning or afternoon departure, then discover the cemetery’s scenery and stories with tour guide, storyteller, historian, author and artist Shannon Scott or his talented assistants. See where death and beauty meet and learn about the symbolism, art, architecture and burial traditions of the Victorian Age and other periods. Hear about famous lyricist Johnny Mercer, underground poet Conrad Aiken, maritime hero Josiah Tattnall and many more who call this special spot their final resting place.

image.alt: Bonaventure Cemetery Is Forever Tour

item.title: 1-Hour Bonaventure Cemetery Golf Cart Guided Tour in Savannah
item.description: The monumental Bonaventure Cemetery is one of the top sights in Savannah, but its sprawling size makes it daunting to cover on foot. With this golf cart tour, take in the most ornate graves and learn about the fascinating history of this landmark cemetery in just an hour without breaking a sweat. Listen to stories about the cemetery's past and the people buried here as you drive through the lush grounds.

image.alt: 1-Hour Bonaventure Cemetery Golf Cart Guided Tour in Savannah

item.title: True Crime Pub Crawl - the Original Savannah Murder Tour
item.description: Set out on a twilight investigation of Savannah's true crime past with this walking cocktail tour. Meet your guide and go for a city stroll that includes both historic landmarks and cocktail bars. Combine sightseeing and happy hour with this tour that includes Oglethorpe Square and Colonial Park Cemetery. Grab to-go drinks and sip away during this walking tour focused on the murders, scandals, and crimes of passion in Savannah's history.

image.alt: True Crime Pub Crawl - the Original Savannah Murder Tour

item.title: Wormsloe Historic Site & Bonaventure Cemetery Tour from Savannah
item.description: Explore historic Georgia without the hassle of navigating on your own on a half - day tour to two major landmarks. Tour starts with a tour of Bonaventure Cemetery. Afterwards enjoy lunch on your own at one of our favorite local restaurants, and then end the tour with a visit to Wormsloe Plantation.

image.alt: Wormsloe Historic Site & Bonaventure Cemetery Tour from Savannah

item.title: Genteel and Bard's Savannah History Walking Tour
item.description: Explore the timeless beauty of Savannah’s Historic District on a walking tour with a live guide, enhanced with professionally recorded stories. Your guide leads you to some of the best-loved places in the city, plus some spots you may have never found on your own. Enjoy this story-telling experience while strolling the historic streets of Georgia’s oldest city.

image.alt: Genteel and Bard's Savannah History Walking Tour
